problems.title: Square Pattern
problems.description:
Write a program to print a square pattern of stars of side n.

Input Format:
A single integer n.

Output Format:
Print the pattern as shown in the examples.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
3

Sample Output
***
***
***

Explanation:
A square of side 3 is printed.
hintsList: Both loops run from 1 to n.
